method: Cook the bow tie pasta according to package instructions.
Grease a round pizza pan with olive oil.
Spread the cooked bow tie pasta evenly on the pizza pan to form the crust.
In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper.
Brush the seasoned oil mixture over the pasta crust.
Bake the pasta crust in the preheated oven for 10 minutes, or until slightly crispy and golden.
Remove the pasta crust from the oven and spread the pizza sauce over it.
Top with mozzarella cheese, sliced bell peppers, sliced mushrooms, and diced red onions.
Return the pizza to the oven and bake for an additional 10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Slice and serve as a unique and delicious pizza delight!
